EmailTemplate.subject: Hello {!Contact.FirstName} , Make Your New Homes Even Smarter!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName} ,
My name is Bryan Hoffman and I work at Palmetto a clean technology company based in Charleston, SC. We understand that energy savings are a top priority to your customers when they are purchasing a new home.
That is why we've created Palmetto Home, a technology product that allows your customers to track their home's energy consumption down to an individual room or appliance in the home.
Palmetto Home allows you as a home builder to... - Show your customers the real time energy savings - Continuously show your customers the savings from their new home - Direct communication to your customers - Mange electrical consumption, rather than accepting it as a fixed cost - Establish baseline measurements for you homes - Social media connectivity,allowing your customers to share their positive experience
I would love to setup a time to show you the Palmetto Home app in order to provide you with a visual image of what your customers would be interacting with on a daily basis.
Thank You,
{!User.Name} Palmetto Clean Energy Technology Team bryan.hoffman@palmetto.com Office: 843-720-1844 www.Palmetto.com
